title: Shroud Expo to Open in San Antonio
author: Andy

title: Shroud Expo to Open in San Antonio
post: I am at Haven for Hope.  Being able to go to this exhibit would be so inspiring to me.  Because I am homeless I cannot  afford a ticket.  This would be a wonderful Christmas present.  Is there any way for me to get a ticket?
author: Gloria Cordova
